title: Fix AI rumors to be roster-aware
description: Rumors generated by NewsGenerationService currently don't have roster context, leading to rumors about wrestlers not in the game. Update rollForRumor to pass a summary of the current roster to the AI.
notes: Refined AI rumor generation to specifically use only the ACTIVE roster (using findAllByActiveTrue()). NPCs remain in scope. Added a new test case 'testRollForRumor_ExcludesInactiveWrestlers' to ensure retired or inactive wrestlers are not passed to the AI. All tests passed.
close_reason: AI rumor generation is now roster-aware, including NPCs, with strict instructions to avoid hallucinations. Verified with updated unit tests.

title: Support manager assignment in wrestlers.json
description: Add a 'managerName' field to wrestlers.json to allow default manager assignments during data initialization. Update DataInitializer to resolve and link the manager NPC.
close_reason: Fixed MultipleBagFetchException by refactoring Segment collections to Sets and verified with regression tests.

title: Refactor: Replace 'var' with explicit types in CampaignDashboardView.java
description: The use of 'var' in CampaignDashboardView.java, specifically in the addSkillUpgradesSection method loop, is causing compilation issues after Spotless formatting and clashes with the new code style guideline for explicit typing. This needs to be refactored to use 'CampaignUpgrade' explicitly instead of 'var'. This issue blocks proper compilation and E2E test execution.
close_reason: Refactor confirmed: 'var' has been replaced with explicit types in CampaignDashboardView.java as requested by code style guidelines.
